• Mobile controls with D-pad and action buttons for touch devices
  • Multiplayer mining game using MQTT for real-time synchronization
  • Procedural terrain generation with multiple ore types and depth-based resources
  • Building system allowing placement of structures and explosives
  • Teleportation network for fast travel between discovered relays
  • Admin system with host election, player management, and save control
  • IndexedDB save system with import/export capabilities
  • Dynamic lighting system with day/night cycle and sky rendering
  • Upgrades for drill tier, hull, fuel, cargo, heat resistance, and X-ray vision
  • Chat system with sound effects for player join/leave/death events
    const Game = new GameEngine();
    const Input = new InputManager();

This is a browser-based multiplayer mining game with mobile support. Players dig through procedurally generated terrain to find resources, build structures, and trade with others. The game features real-time synchronization via MQTT, a dynamic day/night cycle, and an admin system for host management. Players can upgrade their mining equipment, discover teleporters for fast travel, and manage their inventory at service stations.
